item.description: Well more like a shed doormer raising. I've been working on apartment in my garage and decided I needed to add a doormer to make room for the bathroom. Joe and I will be working on it that weekend and thought we could get together, pound a few nails and grill some burgers, dogs, afterwards on me. No experience necessary, beverages will be provided. Hope to see you there!

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: Barn Raising/Novemberfest
